item.title: Career Roadmap
item.description: =======(Work Level) 27 (Seniro 2 : PHD) (8k =18w 250w==> house allowance 3k 28 (Sepcialist) 250~300 (1.2k 25w 29 (Senior specialist/engineer manager) 300~400 (1.5k) 30 (manager) M3 (400-500) =======(Stategy Level) 31 (director ) == Poll M4 32(Manager director ) M6~M7 (E) 33 (VP) 34 (EVP) 35(SVP) 36(GVP) 37 (CEO) Data Science Manager (Singapore based) Agoda Drive the growth of your team and build a diverse, entrepreneurial team. You are a developer of people.
